meanings.sent1: She outstepped her friend in the race.
meanings.sent2: The athlete outstepped the competition to win the gold medal.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit outstepped the tortoise in the race, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outstepped any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's graceful movements outstepped all others on the stage.

meanings.definition: To go beyond in stepping out.
meanings.sent1: He outstepped his usual boundaries and explored new territories.
meanings.sent2: The hiker outstepped the marked trail and discovered a hidden waterfall.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous cat outstepped its usual route and got lost in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity outstepped her fear, leading her to new adventures.
meanings.sent5: The explorer's spirit outstepped the limitations of the map, seeking the unknown.
